DialerConfig.description: The possible types of dialer config parameters

OutboundCallConfig.description: The configuration used for outbound calls.

properties.name: ConnectContactFlowArn
properties.description: The identifier of the contact flow for the outbound call.

type.description: The identifier of the contact flow for the outbound call.

properties.name: ConnectSourcePhoneNumber
properties.description: The phone number associated with the Amazon Connect instance, in E.164 format. If you do not specify a source phone number, you must specify a queue.

type.description: The phone number associated with the Amazon Connect instance, in E.164 format. If you do not specify a source phone number, you must specify a queue.

properties.name: ConnectQueueArn
properties.description: The queue for the call. If you specify a queue, the phone displayed for caller ID is the phone number specified in the queue. If you do not specify a queue, the queue defined in the contact flow is used. If you do not specify a queue, you must specify a source phone number.

type.description: The queue for the call. If you specify a queue, the phone displayed for caller ID is the phone number specified in the queue. If you do not specify a queue, the queue defined in the contact flow is used. If you do not specify a queue, you must specify a source phone number.

properties.name: BandwidthAllocation
properties.description: The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource.

type.description: The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource.

properties.name: DialingCapacity
properties.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

type.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

properties.name: BandwidthAllocation
properties.description: The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource.

type.description: The bandwidth allocation of a queue resource.

properties.name: DialingCapacity
properties.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

type.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

properties.name: DialingCapacity
properties.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

type.description: Allocates dialing capacity for this campaign between multiple active campaigns.

AnswerMachineDetectionConfig.description: The configuration used for answering machine detection during outbound calls

properties.name: EnableAnswerMachineDetection
properties.description: Flag to decided whether outbound calls should have answering machine detection enabled or not

type.description: Flag to decided whether outbound calls should have answering machine detection enabled or not

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 256 characters in length.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 256 characters in length.
